attributes.action: support road charging and use the money to promote public transport, cycleways etc.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Current transport policies favour car use over trains, cycling and walking. If we are to combat climate change, reduce pollution and congestion, we need to promote safe, attractive alternatives to car use.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
